about.title: About
about.subtitle: Shira helps users develop the skills needed to identify and defeat phishing attacks on email and messaging apps.

option_1.title: 1. Easy to use
option_1.description: Shira was created considering communities that are the most at-risk of phishing attacks, especially users with limited tech literacy.

option_2.title: 2. Customizable
option_2.description: We try to make phishing messages look as realistic as possible, to simulate what internet users actually face in their daily lives and the phishing attacks they are likely to face.

option_3.title: 3. Privacy-friendly
option_3.description: We do not collect, save, or share any data about users visiting Shira or taking quizzes. To learn more, check out our privacy policy and a recent security audit performed by an independent security firm.

description.section1: Shira is a project by Horizontal, a non-profit that supports frontline defenders, activists and journalists through digital security and tool development.

background.title: Background
background.subtitle: Phishing is a major security threat for Internet users everywhere.
background.section1: Often, emails and messages claiming to be from trusted organizations, companies and individuals are actually attempts to trick users into sharing sensitive information (such as bank account information and passwords) or installing malware.
background.section3: Despite how widespread and alarming this threat is -- with real-life consequences especially for marginalized communities -- there are few easy-to-use solution to build skills to detect and defeat phishing attacks effectively.

bring.title: Bring Shira to your organization
bring.section1: By default, Shira includes several options to customize quizzes and make them relevant to each user (apps, fields of work, etc). But if you want to make quizzes even more realistic-looking to your staff, partners, or members, we can help: we can create custom quizzes based on your work and context, even using real-life phishing attacks you received, and provide training to your organization.
bring.section2: If that sounds interesting to you or if you have questions, contact us at contact@wearehorizontal.org.
